TopicTitle: Bi-Lateral Symmetry mode for EAS-1 (Lawn Chair) not correct.

Articles.Content:
When placing the EAS-1 in Bi-Lateral Symmerty (like for rovers or aircraft) mode, the reciprocal part is not aligned properly.

Rover wheels seem to be placed correctly.  However, the EAS-1 (Lawn chair) seat is not placed correctly when placed in Bi-Lateral symmetry mode.
